title: Border Ghost Stories
author: Pease, Howard
snippet: We slept but fitfully, and rose early to help prepare our breakfast. Scarcely had we finished our repast when a neighbour arrived with a cartand horse wherewith he had promised to 'lift' the corpse and convey itover the rough track down the valley to the spot where the hearse fromMiddleton was to meet it.
